price: 194 Veuille, Seigneur, nous accorder ce que Tu nous as promis par la bouche de Tes Messagers et ne pas nous couvrir d’ignominie le Jour de la résurrection. Tu ne manques jamais à Ta promesse ! »
arabic: رَبَّنَا وَءَاتِنَا مَا وَعَدتَّنَا عَلَىٰ رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخۡزِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۖ إِنَّكَ لَا تُخۡلِفُ ٱلۡمِيعَادَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: rabbanā waātinā mā waʿadttanā ʿalā rusulika walā tukh'zinā yawma al-qiyāmati innaka lā tukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
